description:
This is where you describe your game. Pretend you are marketing the game and that people have no clue what it is.
Or make it silly. Whatever you wish I have no control over you.

v0.1.0.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.1.0

This mod is made for the 4.0.1 version of Casualties: Unknown, which is currently the latest version on the game's [Itch page](https://orsonik.itch.io/scav-prototype). Make sure this is the version of the game you have before continuing.

# **Setup Guide**
1. Download and install the client mod by extracting the CUAPClientMod0.1.0.zip folder into the game's directory.
	- If done correctly, a BepInEx folder should appear.
2. Download the APWorld and place it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago install
3. Download the .yaml file attached and fill out your desired settings
4. Generate a multiworld and host a server.
5. Launch the game normally and click past the introductory story.
6. In the top right, enter the room connection information.
	- If you want to run with Deathlink, click the 'Deathlink' button.
	- If you don't, just click 'connect'.
7. I recommend also connecting a text client, as Experiment is known to skip out on saying the item receive dialog sometimes.
	- Item receive dialogs also are limited to the same rules as normal dialog, where having impaired speech, brain damage, or being Hollow can change how text looks or remove it altogether.
8. If anything goes wrong while playing, please let me know. This is still in very early development and isn't anywhere near stable.

# **Sending Chat Messages**

Despite its limited functionality, you can send chat messages and chat commands. Open the in-game debug console with ` and start your command with 'talk '. Everything after the space will be sent as a chat message, including any commands like '!hint'. Note that there is no way to see incoming chat messages, so you will need a text client or another player to tell you.

# **Known issues**

Currently, there is no logic applied to the randomization, but this also cannot generate impossible seeds, as there is nothing ever blocking you from goaling. I plan to add minimal forms of logic in v0.2.0 at the latest.
v0.1.0.title: CUAP v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.1.1

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Fixed the client goaling an entire layer early (#3)
Fixed Deathlink messages wordwrapping repeatedly if Deathlink was set to large_limb_damage (#4)
Disabled random amounts of bleeding and pain from Deathlink limb damage
There is now an onscreen message when goaling, similar to Deathlink receive messages

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1
v0.1.1.title: CUAP v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.1.2

This release updated the APWorld. Make sure you get the new version!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Fixed depth milestones being offset starting at 1300m (#5)
Fixed the game not properly goaling when reaching 1500m (#6) [APWorld change]
Rewrote some log messages to be clearer, might help with debugging later
Removed a redundant error message
Fixed the in-game message when goaling

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2
v0.1.2.title: CUAP v0.1.2

v0.2.0.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.2.0

This release updated the APWorld. Make sure you get the new version!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Logic! Going deeper now requires Depth Extender items, which are obtained through the multiworld (#1) [APWorld change]
Moodlesanity also has some logic now, with Hearing Loss requiring either Wasteland or access to repairing Drill Pods if Recipe Randomization is on (#1) [APWorld change]
New yaml option that lets you specify custom goal depth, up to 5000m (#2) [APWorld change]
Dying with Deathlink disabled no longer sends a stray Deathlink
Recipe Randomization no longer spams the log when loading a new game
Three new traps have been added: Earthquake Trap, Reversed Controls Trap, and Sleep Trap [APWorld change]
Actually remembered to increase the version number this time

I rewrote basically half the APWorld with this update, so things might break. Let me know if they do.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.1.2...v0.2.0
v0.2.0.title: CUAP v0.2.0

v0.2.1.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.2.1

This release updated the APWorld. Make sure you get the new version!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
APWorld stopped generating for some reason, fixed that [APWorld change]
Ingame client now shows number of depth extenders and your max depth
Drillpods no longer let you go past your max depth for one layer (#7)
Removed a section from the readme that no longer applies

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1
v0.2.1.title: CUAP v0.2.1

v0.3.0.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.3.0

This release updated the APWorld. Make sure you get the new version!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
The client no longer comes prepackaged with BepInEx. This fixes the mod not working on Windows 11 (#11)
Items are now properly randomized across all games instead of being only locally randomized [APWorld Change] (#8)
Redid Recipe Randomization to properly block players from crafting recipes they don't have (#9)
Changed some Moodlesanity locations to logically require Overgrown Depths [APWorld Change] (#13)
The client now forces the player to the main menu if Archipelago ever disconnects.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3.0
v0.3.0.title: CUAP v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.3.1

This release updated the APWorld. Make sure you get the new version!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Fixed the starting layer always being Gravel Lands [APWorld Change]
If Experiment cannot speak or their speech is impaired, an on-screen message will be displayed over the normal dialogue system (#25)
The Hearing Loss trap no longer sets your hearing loss to 50, but instead increases it by 50
New .yaml setting to exclude certain Moodles from Moodlesanity [APWorld Change] (#23)
Added eight new trap items...
- Unchipped Trap: Turns on the Unchipped difficulty for 90 seconds (#14)
- Elder Thornback Trap: Plays a random Elder Thornback music track (#15)
- Cave Ticks Trap: Spawns a swarm of Cave Ticks at the camera's center (#16)
- Bad Rep Trap: Makes all traders in the current layer hostile (#17)
- Disfigured Trap: Removes Experiment's jaw for 180 seconds (#18)
- Fellow Experiment: Gives you a friend! (#21)
- Fragile Items Trap: Makes a random item in Experiment's inventory break on next use (#22)
- Mindwipe Trap: Mindwipes Experiment for 70 seconds (#24)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1
v0.3.1.title: v0.3.1

v0.4.0.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.4.0

This release is the first version to support V5PreTesting4! Expect (hopefully minor) bugs!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
V5PreTesting4 support! [APWorld Change] (#29)
New .yaml option to exclude certain Moodles from Moodlesanity [APWorld Change] (#23)
Onscreen item popups now include the Location name, as an Archipelago text client does
Experiment no longer talks during item popups if they are only speech-impaired or underwater
Changed almost all Item and Location IDs [APWorld Change]
New filler items: Hope and Despair. They do nothing. [APWorld Change]
V5 Moodles and Recipes for their respective sanites [APWorld Change] (#29)
Removed unneeded log spam for hopefully easier debugging
Skillsanity. Each level up to level 15 are locations, with the stat increases for them being items [APWorld Change] (#29)
Client now autosaves during an AP disconnect (#28)
Blueprints now send their checks when used instead of when spawned (#26)
Free Samples. Upon receiving a recipe, a free copy of that item is spawned [APWorld Change] (#20)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.0
v0.4.0.title: v0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.4.1
APWorld is compatible with v0.4.0

Some options are still in testing! Only use them in testing syncs!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Multiple Moodlesanity locations had incorrect IDs client-side
Blueprints now have custom item names and descriptions, acting as in-game hints (#27)
...along with that, blueprints actually work now

# Known Issues
Skillsanity checks are inconsistent at best
Free Samples doesn't work with certain recipes

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1

APWorld is NOT compatible with v0.4.1

Some options are still in testing! Only use them in testing syncs!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
V5PreTesting5 support (#32)
Added the two new Moodles in PreTesting5 [APWorld Change]
Added the new recipes in PreTesting5 [APWorld Change]
The intro story on the main menu is now instantly skipped
Traps that last a preset duration now give a Moodle showing it's from Archipelago
Skillsanity no longer has locations, only items. This is hopefully temporary while I try to fix skills. [APWorld Change]

# Known Issues
Free Samples doesn't work with certain recipes

v0.4.3.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.4.3
APWorld is compatible with v0.4.2

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
The debug console now acts as an in-game text client (#34)
Elder Thornback Trap now causes the 'Sense of impending doom' moodle
The main menu disclaimer has been updated to display CUAP information
The client's title no longer changes during connection
DeathLink is now an in-game debug console command [APWorld Change]
Saving on disconnection has been disabled (again...)
Blueprint in-game hints now display the information for the nearest blueprint instead of the first spawned

# Known Issues
Free Samples doesn't work with certain recipes

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.3
v0.4.3.title: v0.4.3

v0.4.4.description:
### Casualties: Unknown/Scav Prototype Archipelago v0.4.4
APWorld is compatible with versions v0.4.2 and above

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
The in-game client has been moved, allowing connection on monitors with resolutions below 1920x1080
Fixed not being able to connect if Recipe Randomization is disabled
Receiving a DeathLink now shows the cause, or slot name if a cause isn't defined

# Known Issues
Free Samples doesn't work with certain recipes
APWorlds with varying datapackages can show incorrect or missing items in the in-game text client

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.4.3...v0.4.4
v0.4.4.title: v0.4.4

v0.4.5.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.4.5
APWorld is compatible with versions v0.4.2 and above, despite a minor update

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Removed 'Scav Prototype' from the mod's name, just like the game
Filler items now give a very minor happiness change
Deathlinks that are sent now have a bit more variety
The client's GUI is a little more dynamic, and is now located on the top left
Traps items now have custom popups when received
Potential fix for the blank crafting menu when recipes are randomized
Layers are no longer randomized when loading into the tutorial
Having DeathLink disabled no longer causes massive lag
Lots of trap bugfixes/changes:
- Unchipped Trap no longer overrides layer modifiers
- Skillsanity no longer changes INT during a Mindwipe Trap
- Mindwipe trap now works in V5PreTesting5
- Fixed the Elder Thornback Trap lasting a little under 85 minutes (now lasts 90 seconds)
- Elder Thornback Trap is a little more dynamic
- Fragile Items Trap now no longer needs two items in the inventory to work
- Disfigured Trap properly resets muscle damage after it ends
- Mindwipe Trap now removes the Mindwipe's hearing loss after it ends
- Mindwipe Trap now resets brain health after it ends
- Bad Rep Trap no longer nukes your happiness
- Fragile Items Trap now destroys the item instead of leaving it at 1%
- New trap: Pushup Trap [APWorld Change]

Overhauled the in-game text client:
- Sending chat messages is now done using the new `apchat` command.
- Multiple common Archipelago commands have unique commands in the console. Check the README for the full list.

# Known Issues
Free Samples doesn't work with certain recipes
APWorlds with varying datapackages can show incorrect or missing items in the in-game text client
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.4.4...v0.4.5
v0.4.5.title: v0.4.5

v0.5.0.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.5.0
APWorld is NOT compatible with previous versions 

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Multiple goals! You can now choose to have your goal set to escaping Overgrown Depths and make layers progressive instead [APWorld change] (#35)
Hints are now visible in the text client (#36)
Blueprint sprite swap with a pixelated Archipelago logo (#31)
Add archipelago.json to APWorld [APWorld Change]
Starting a new run no longer instantly sends the "Moodlesanity - Immunocompromised" location instantly
New Experiment dialogue has been added
Deathlinks can no longer fail to send due to an IndexOutOfRangeException
Bad Rep Trap no longer boosts your happiness if the trader was already angry

# Known Issues
Free Samples doesn't work with certain recipes
APWorlds with varying datapackages can show incorrect or missing items in the in-game text client
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.4.5...v0.5.0
v0.5.0.title: v0.5.0

v0.5.1.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.5.1
APWorld is NOT compatible with previous versions

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
New in-game command for reporting bugs `apreportbug`
New goal: Defeat Elder Thornback. Start on a random layer and goal when an Elder Thornback is defeated (#37) [APWorld change]
The client and APWorld now have a minimum version of AP 0.6.5 [APWorld change]
The disconnect button has been removed during runs to prevent accidental disconnection
The client autosaves on disconnection again (please tell me if this breaks) (#28)
The Archipelago AssetBundle should no longer attempt to load more than once
Recipe Randomization has been rewritten, fixing the empty crafting menu for good
- Recipes now start with an INT requirement of 999 by default, then go to the vanilla requirement once unlocked
Mindwipe Trap no longer revives Experiment if they died during the trap's duration
Archipelago moodles no longer display over the death screen

# Known Issues
APWorlds with varying datapackages can show incorrect or missing items in the in-game text client
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

v0.5.2.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.5.2
APWorld is compatible with previous versions

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Fixed Depth Extenders not being added to the item pool if the goal is set to Reach Depth, making the seed impossible [APWorld Change]
Updated the client's backend to a newer version
Overhauled the in-game UI
- New onscreen messages when receiving items, replacing the experiment dialogue system
- New onscreen popup when a hint is located in your world, or one of your items is hinted in another world
- Easier to see onscreen error messages when something goes wrong

The client will now disconnect if a critical error occurs instead of trying to continue regardless
Added a new in-game command to reset the anti-duplicate location measures. Use `apresetantispam` if a location isn't sending for some reason
Fixed Deathlink not being able to be turned on
Changed `aptoggledeathlink` command to `apdeathlink` to make it less wordy
Upscaled the Archipelago Item sprite from 8x12 to 200x200
Recipes learned from Archipelago will now always show in the crafting menu, regardless of INT requirement. Thanks to realhumanbeing in the AP: After Dark discord for this idea

# Known Issues
APWorlds with incorrectly structured datapackages can show incorrect or missing items in the in-game text client
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
The game may rarely refuse to send checks until it is restarted. I don't know what causes this

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2

v0.5.3.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.5.3
APWorld is compatible with versions 0.5.1 and above

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
(probably) Fixed SendChecks returning null on some computers, causing the client to randomly disconnect
Fixed the AP Error notification always being onscreen in some cases
Fixed DeathLink messages being blank if the DeathLink had an included cause
Changed the displayed text onscreen when goaling the slot to congratulate you!
Onscreen AP messages should no longer overlap

# Known Issues
APWorlds with incorrectly structured datapackages can show incorrect or missing items in the in-game text client
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
The game may rarely refuse to send checks until it is restarted. I don't know what causes this

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.3
v0.5.3.title: v0.5.3

v0.5.4.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.5.4
APWorld is compatible with versions 0.5.1 and above

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Fixed a desync between Archipelago's client tags and the mod's internal tags, causing DeathLinks to fail to send
Fixed an IndexOutOfRange exception that could rarely occur when sending a DeathLink
Skills earned by Skillsanity should no longer vanish upon game restart
Fixed the spelling of "Congratulations". You've done it too, be honest

# Known Issues
APWorlds with incorrectly structured datapackages can show incorrect or missing items in the in-game text client
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
The game may rarely refuse to send checks until it is restarted. I don't know what causes this

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.5.3...v0.5.4

v0.6.0.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.6.0
This update is compatible with worlds generated on v0.6.0-pre4!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
## From Last Pre-release
Fixed an issue where the APWorld would fail to generate if Moodlesanity was set to anything except Questboard [APWorld Change]
Fixed `Moodlesanity - Withdrawl` not sending [APWorld Change]
Fixed Moodlesanity errors sticking around for a ridiculously long time
Fixed sending moodles that weren't yet displayed on the Moodlesanity Questboard
Fixed the Moodlesanity Questboard showing up even when it was disabled
Fixed the Skillsanity tracker showing up even when it was disabled
Fixed the left and right arms being swapped
The client now properly aborts the connection attempt if no port is given

## From Last Stable
Everything above and...
Completely replaced the backend a second time. Hopefully, nothing catastrophically breaks this time.
Added new recipes from V5Pretesting5's second release, because apparently those exist [APWorld Change]
Moved the location IDs of all recipes to prepare for more layers being added [APWorld Change]
Actually fixed the overlapping mentioned in v0.5.3
Fixed a NullReferenceException when receiving Skillsanity items on the main menu
Changed the formatting of the game's slotdata [APWorld Change]
Absolutely slashed the mod's filesize by over 300kb
Added an onscreen error if Moodlesanity finds a Moodle it doesn't recognize, instead of silently ignoring it
Rewrote the README to fix some typos and make it easier for people new to Archipelago
New `apsetskill` command, which forces Skillsanity skills to a specific value. Use if received skills desync from what you have
Fixed Recipe items being in the item pool, even when Randomize Recipes was disabled [APWorld Change]
Fixed 'Reach Depth' goals causing the slot to instantly goal upon game start
Added Limb Unlocks, where you start with amputated arms and must be sent them again. Suggested by bokyubi in the AP: After Dark Discord [APWorld Change]
Fixed the APWorld version 0.0.0 issue [APWorld Change]
Stopped the client from adding components to Elder Thornback it didn't need to be
Fixed the client silently refusing to connect when using localhost as the server
Item notifications now disappear for a frame, making it more clear when multiple items are received in sequence
Fixed `Moodlesanity - Depression` not sending
Re-added Skillsanity locations to pair with items, and they actually work this time [APWorld Change] (#33)
Updated the look of the in-game UI slightly
New Skillsanity tracker attached to the health panel
Made the status lines in the Archipelago 'Connected!' UI smaller so they don't run off the bottom
Added new Experiment dialogue for limbs and skills
Fixed Experiment saying the wrong things about received items sometimes
Fixed NRE when receiving limbs on the main menu
Fixed arms being re-amputated upon game restart
Added the Moodlesanity Questboard, finally removing those 100+ item sphere 1 generations [APWorld Change] (#42)
Added a version number display, and a popup if the version of the mod doesn't match the server's APWorld [APWorld Change]
Fixed Recipe locations always being enabled, even if Randomize Recipes is disabled

# Known Issues
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
Recipes may sometimes wipe themselves upon reconnection. Getting another recipe item triggers a failsafe that should fix this.

**Full Changelog from last Pre-release**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.6.0-pre4...v0.6.0
**Full Changelog from last Stable**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.5.4...v0.6.0

v0.6.0-hotfix1.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.6.0-hotfix1
This update is compatible with worlds generated on v0.6.0-pre4 and above!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Fixed `Moodlesanity - Broken Ribs` and `Moodlesanity - Broken Jaw`
Fixed recipe locations being included even when recipes are items only [APWorld Change]

# Known Issues
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
Recipes may sometimes wipe themselves upon reconnection. Getting another recipe item triggers a failsafe that should fix this.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.0-hotfix1

v0.6.0-pre1.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.6.0-pre1
APWorld is NOT compatible with previous versions.
*This is a pre-release version made for testing! Bugs may occur!*

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Completely replaced the backend a second time. Hopefully, nothing catastrophically breaks this time.
Added new recipes from V5Pretesting5's second release, because apparently those exist [APWorld Change]
Moved the location IDs of all recipes to prepare for more layers being added [APWorld Change]
Actually fixed the overlapping mentioned in v0.5.3
Fixed a NullReferenceException when receiving Skillsanity items on the main menu
Changed the formatting of the game's slotdata [APWorld Change]
Absolutely slashed the mod's filesize by over 300kb
Added an onscreen error if Moodlesanity finds a Moodle it doesn't recognise, instead of silently ignoring it
Rewrote the README to fix some typos and make it easier for people new to Archipelago

# Known Issues
APWorlds with incorrectly structured datapackages can show incorrect or missing items in the in-game text client
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
Sometimes the APWorld will refuse to generate if the version in the .yaml isn't `0.0.0`. I am clueless as to what causes this to happen.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.5.4...v0.6.0-pre1
v0.6.0-pre1.title: v0.6.0-pre1

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
New `apsetskill` command, which forces Skillsanity skills to a specific value. Use if received skills desync from what you have
Fixed Recipe items being in the item pool, even when Randomize Recipes was disabled [APWorld Change]
Fixed 'Reach Depth' goals causing the slot to instantly goal upon game start
Added Limb Unlocks, where you start with amputated arms and must be sent them again. Suggested by bokyubi in the AP: After Dark Discord [APWorld Change]
(probably) fixed the APWorld version 0.0.0 issue [APWorld Change]
Stopped the client from adding components to Elder Thornback it didn't need to be
Fixed the client silently refusing to connect when using `localhost` as the server
Item notifications now disappear for a frame, making it more clear when multiple items are received in sequence
Fixed `Moodlesanity - Depression` not sending

# Known Issues
APWorlds with incorrectly structured datapackages can show incorrect or missing items in the in-game text client
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle

**Full Changelog from last Pre-release**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.6.0-pre1...v0.6.0-pre2
**Full Changelog from last Stable**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.5.4...v0.6.0-pre2
v0.6.0-pre2.title: v0.6.0-pre2

v0.6.0-pre3.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.6.0-pre3
This update is NOT compatible with worlds generated on previous versions!
*This is a pre-release version made for testing! Bugs may occur!*

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Re-added Skillsanity locations to pair with items, and they actually work this time [APWorld Change] (#33)
Updated the look of the in-game UI slightly
New Skillsanity tracker attached to the health panel
Made the status lines in the Archipelago 'Connected!' UI smaller so they don't run off the bottom
Added new Experiment dialogue for limbs and skills
Fixed Experiment saying the wrong things about received items sometimes
Fixed NRE when receiving limbs on the main menu
Fixed arms being re-amputated upon game restart

# Known Issues
APWorlds with incorrectly structured datapackages can show incorrect or missing items in the in-game text client
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle

**Full Changelog from last Pre-release**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.6.0-pre2...v0.6.0-pre3
**Full Changelog from last Stable**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.5.4...v0.6.0-pre3

v0.6.0-pre4.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.6.0-pre4
This update is NOT compatible with worlds generated on previous versions!
*This is a pre-release version made for testing! Bugs may occur!*

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Added the Moodlesanity Questboard, finally removing those 100+ item sphere 1 generations [APWorld Change] (#42)
Added a version number display, and a popup if the version of the mod doesn't match the server's APWorld [APWorld Change]
Fixed Recipe locations always being enabled, even if Randomize Recipes is disabled

# Known Issues
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle

**Full Changelog from last Pre-release**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.6.0-pre3...v0.6.0-pre4
**Full Changelog from last Stable**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.5.4...v0.6.0-pre4

v0.6.1.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.6.1
This update is compatible with worlds generated on v0.6.0-pre4 and above!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Support Casualties: Unknown V5.01

# Known Issues
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
Recipes may sometimes wipe themselves upon reconnection. Getting another recipe item triggers a failsafe that should fix this.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

v0.6.2.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.6.2
This update is NOT compatible with worlds generated previous versions!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
Fixed arms being injured/broken/dislocated upon being received from Archipelago
Fixed layer randomization taking place inside the tutorial
Fixed spelling of Moodlesanity in the `Moodlesantiy - Sense of impending doom` location [APWorld Change]
Increased Questboard slots to 8, and you now start with 2 [APWorld Change]
Added a reroll function to the Moodlesanity Questboard. Includes a .yaml option to change cooldown time [APWorld Change]
Added presets to the Moodlesanity Exclusions .yaml option for fatal and luck dependent moodles [APWorld Change]
Added autocomplete to Moodlesanity Exclusions inside the Options Creator [APWorld Change]
Removed unneeded network spam

# Known Issues
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
Recipes may sometimes wipe themselves upon reconnection. Getting another recipe item triggers a failsafe that should fix this.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.2

v0.6.3.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.6.3
This update is compatible with worlds generated on versions 0.6.2 and above!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
- Removed `Tachycardia` and `Bradycardia` from the Deadly Moodlesanity Exclusions preset [APWorld Change]
- Fixed Archipelago traps throwing Moodlesanity errors
- Added unique logos to Archipelago trap moodles
- Added support for Casualties: Unknown V5.0.3 (this was a pain, things might be broken)

# Known Issues
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
Recipes may sometimes wipe themselves upon reconnection. Getting another recipe item triggers a failsafe that should fix this

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.6.2...v0.6.3

v0.6.4.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.6.4
This update is NOT compatible with worlds generated on previous versions!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
- Fixed the game crashing rarely when receiving a hint
- Fixed `Material bag Recipe` throwing an ArgumentOutOfRange error [APWorld Change]
- Fixed `Moodlesanity - Water-intoxicated` not sending
- Fixed hands given by Progressive Arms having broken/damaged claws
- The Archipelago GUI now only shows if the gamma panel is open, saving screen space
- The APWorld now properly throws an OptionError if no Trap Item Weights are given (thanks to palex00 for reporting) [APWorld Change]
- The in-game text client now shows the classic Archipelago colors
- Added new Stimulated moodle introduced in V5.0.3 [APWorld Change]
- Added withdrawal related moodles to the Difficult exclusions preset

# Known Issues
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
Recipes may sometimes wipe themselves upon reconnection. Getting another recipe item triggers a failsafe that should fix this

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.6.3...v0.6.4

v0.6.5.description:
### Casualties: Unknown Archipelago v0.6.5
This update is compatible with worlds generated on versions 0.6.4 and above!

For instructions on how to set up and play this mod, check the [README](https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/blob/master/README.md).

# Changes
- Update to support Casualties: Unknown v5.1
- Item, Hint, and Error popup notifications are no longer affected by the game's speed
- Added Start Inventory from Pool option [APWorld Change]
- Added option groups [APWorld Change]

# Known Issues
Getting two traps in quick succession can cause the incorrect slot name inside the trap Moodle
Recipes may sometimes wipe themselves upon reconnection. Getting another recipe item triggers a failsafe that should fix this
Universal Tracker shows the wrong Moodles being in logic when Moodlesanity is set to Questboard

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/CUAP/compare/v0.6.4...v0.6.5
